title: Update Project

params.name: project_public_id
params.desc: Required. The unique ID of the Project.

params.name: abbreviation
params.desc: The Project abbreviation used in Story summaries. Should be kept to 3 characters at most.

params.name: archived
params.desc: A true/false boolean indicating whether the Story is in archived state.

params.name: color
params.desc: The color that represents the Project in the UI.

params.name: days_to_thermometer
params.desc: The number of days before the thermometer appears in the Story summary.

params.name: follower_ids
params.desc: An array of UUIDs for any Members you want to add as Followers.

params.name: show_thermometer
params.desc: Configuration to enable or disable thermometers in the Story summary.

params.name: team_id
params.desc: The ID of the team the project belongs to.

description: Update Project can be used to change properties of a Project.
